mapper.update: update hub_notice set notice_status = #{noticeStatus}, publish_time = #{publishTime}, stat_total = (select count(1) from hub_notice_user where notice_id = #{noticeId}) where notice_id = #{noticeId}
mapper.select: select r.read_status, r.read_back, n.notice_id, n.notice_title, n.notice_status, n.notice_type, n.notice_level, n.is_system, n.publish_time, n.create_by from hub_notice_user r, hub_notice n where n.notice_id = r.notice_id and r.read_status in (0, 10) and r.user_code = #{userCode} order by n.publish_time desc
mapper.update: update hub_notice_user set read_status = case when read_status = 0 then 1 when read_status = 10 then 11 else read_status end where user_code = #{userCode} and id = #{msgId}
mapper.insert: insert into hub_notice_user(notice_id, user_code) select notice_id, #{userCode} from hub_notice where notice_status = 1 and goals_all = 1 on conflict(notice_id, user_code) do nothing
mapper.update: update hub_notice set stat_total = stat_total + 1 where notice_status = 1 and goals_all = 1
